column4: hey i'm new to the whole linux/ubuntu thing and i was wondering if anyone could help me out with a problem i am having..
ok i'm trying to figure out how to install programs once i d/l them but i can't get it to work..
can anyone give me a walkthrough on how to install a .rpm file?
on well i d/l a wineX program that is a .rpm and i was wondering how to install it.
